english.segment1: "surely half the world must be blind; they can see nothing unless it glitters.". -august & julius hare
english.segment2: all my friends are lonely. they left me only. minutes in the hole. so i'll fake a listen. sneak a kiss in. but only love is gold
english.segment3: and i see you from afar. i know who you are. i can tell you all apart
english.segment4: would you marry me. so we'll be free. for a lovely day. would you care to fall. and selll us all. and would you laugh along the way
english.segment5: and i see you from afar. i know who you are. i can tell you all apart
english.segment6: if you leave it to me she said. you're asking the world. and if you take it from me instead. who will you owe
english.segment7: wouldn't i be freezing. but so alive. if i killed another day. thought i've never fallen. still you mention often. that i wanted to be saved
english.segment8: and i see you from afar. i know who you are. i can tell you all apart
english.segment9: if you leave it to me she said. you're asking the world. and if you take it from me instead. who will you owe
english.segment10: i caught my hand in the door again. what is it for. if you leave it to me she said. who will you owe
